name: ARPB_VISITS
description: This table contains Professional Billing visit information stored in the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file. It doesn�t include HAR records created for Hospital Billing and Single Billing Office.

columns.name: PB_VISIT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: PB_BILLING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the Professional Billing status category ID for the visit.

columns.name: PB_FO_OVRRD_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: This column indicates whether the Professional Billing filing order has been overridden by a user.

columns.name: PB_FO_MSPQ_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column indicates whether the filing order for the Professional Billing visit has been verified by Medicare Secondary Payer Questionnaire logic.

columns.name: PB_VISIT_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the PB visit number.

columns.name: PRIM_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number associated with the primary patient contact on the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: GUARANTOR_ID
columns.description: Stores the guarantor ID associated with the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The primary coverage on the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the Professional Billing visit is self-pay.

columns.name: DO_NOT_BILL_INS_YN
columns.description: Indicates�whether the Professional Billing visit has the Do Not Bill Insurance flag set.

columns.name: ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The financial class category ID�for the Professional Billing visit.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area of the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: REVENUE_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The revenue location of the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department of the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: PB_TOTAL_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains the combined total balance of transactions on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_TOTAL_CHARGES
columns.description: The total charges on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_TOTAL_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The total payments on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_TOTAL_ADJ
columns.description: Contains total adjustments on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_INS_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains insurance balance on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_UND_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains undistributed balances on the PB visit.

columns.name: PB_SELFPAY_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains the self-pay balance on the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: PB_BAD_DEBT_BALANCE
columns.description: Contains the bad debt balance on the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who created the Professional Billing visit record.

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FIRST_PB_CHG_TX_ID
columns.description: Contains the first valid Professional Billing charge on the Professional Billing visit.

columns.name: BAL_FULL_SELF_PAY_YN
columns.description: This item shows whether the balances for this hospital account are in full self-pay.
